title: SDK Documentation
description: The tools in this SDK make the LUCI platform, sensor information and a control interfaces, available to organizations and leading research institutions, allowing them to use LUCI as a research tool. To use the SDK you will need a LUCI enabled chair updated to LuciCore Sandbox Edition, Version 2.0.3 or greater. If you are interested in gaining access to the Sandbox, contact info@luci.com.
